name: Phrecia
description: Try one of the 19 alternate ascendancy classes or the Idol Endgame System.

rules.name: Alternate Ascendancies
rules.description: All of the 19 Ascendancy classes you are familiar with will be replaced with new ones.

name: Hardcore Phrecia
description:
Try one of the 19 alternate ascendancy classes or the Idol Endgame System.

A character killed in Hardcore Phrecia becomes a Standard character.
